title: Easyusetools for activation of TomTom Maps and patched ttsystem
description:
How to use it:

1) Make complete backup of your navigation!
2) Unpack downloaded file to C: or C:temp or other directory without spaces. All files will be in Easyusetools folder
3) a) you have Navcore application 8.300: copy file ttsystem from ttsystem_pro_8300 folder into main folder of your navigation (replace original file)
   b) you have older Navcore: copy ttsystem file from navigation into ttsystem_Patcher folder and execute RunMe.bat. Copy back patched ttsystem to navigation (original will be saved as ttsystem.old)
4) Delete all files from map folder you want to replace in navigation (e.g. Western_and_Central_Europe; you can leave there POI files) and put there new map files.
5) Copy files *.meta and *.pna (e.g. Western_and_Central_Europe-19.meta and Western_and_Central_Europe.pna) from new map into folder insert_meta_from_Map_here (at PC). 
6) Execute RunMeforAllAutomatic.cmd. File *.dct should be created (in folder insert_meta_from_Map_here) and also copied at a map folder in your navigation (check this).
7) Restart navigation and enjoy

More information is in readme file inside.

Some discussions:  <a href="
http://forum.gsmhosting.com/vbb/showthread.php?t=586405&page=20" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forum.gsmhosting.com/vbb/showthread.php?t=586405&page=20</a>
